jobs.title: Graduate Software Engineer
description: I am working as part of the applications team to develop the future control platform for the vacuum pumps

jobs.title: Student Software Engineer
description: This was my year in industry placement as part of my computer science course at UKC
I was employed as part of the UI design team for the Edwards S3 project, implementing the interface which displays information about different systems, such as vacuum pumps
I followed the agile scrum process and I was part of stand-ups every morning, as well as sprint reviews and retrospectives at the end of each sprint

jobs.title: Student Software Engineer
description: This was a temporary summer placement in which I was tasked with developing a device to interface with the pump controllers
The main device was an ESP32 with an XLR connector which plugged directly into the pump controller
It used MQTT to publish the data so it could be aggregated and displayed clearly for the client
I designed a cross-platform application to display the data from the pumps, which also supported bluetooth connectivity

jobs.title: Floor Attendant
description: I worked in the arcade called Flamingo which is owned by Admiral Casino
My job was to refill prizes in machines, empty collected coins out the bottom of the machines, exchange tickets for prizes, and assisting customers with any issues they had
On occasion, I also exchanged and counted money

jobs.title: Assistant Web Developer
description: I worked on small websites for customers, kept them up to date with my progress, and regularly checked in to see if they wanted any changes
I also managed existing websites using the Joomla CMS

projects.name: Video to Frame Average Color Image
projects.description: Using Flutter and Rust to convert a video to an image made up of columns of the average color of each interval frame.

projects.name: MyMemory Translate Package
projects.description: A Dart package to communicate with the MyMemory translate API.

projects.name: Food Manager
projects.description: A food/inventory management system I built for my parents.

projects.name: Rust Ray Tracer
projects.description: A ray tracer built following the Ray Tracing in One Weekend book.

projects.name: Excel Cells to Image
projects.description: A simple script to convert Excel cells to an image.

projects.name: Image to Excel Cells
projects.description: A simple script to convert any image into an Excel spreadsheet.

projects.name: Simple Slideshow
projects.description: A simple slideshow app to replace the removed slideshow feature in Windows 11.

projects.name: Simple Weather
projects.description: A simple weather app that displays the weather over the next week at your location.

projects.name: Aromatherapy App
projects.description: An app about essential oils and their uses in aromatherapy.
